trans-unit.source: Provides access to a rich set of management information and management events about the system, devices, and applications instrumented to the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供對管理資訊和管理事件的豐富集合的存取，這些是有關檢測 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 基礎結構內的系統、裝置和應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services can query for interesting management information (such as how much free space is left on the disk, what is the current CPU utilization, which database a certain application is connected to, and much more), using classes derived from <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher" /> and <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementQuery" />, or subscribe to a variety of management events using the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementEventWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務可以使用衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementQuery" /> 的類別來查詢相關的管理資訊 (例如，磁碟上剩下多少可用空間、目前 CPU 使用率如何、某特定應用程式連接至哪個資料庫等)，或使用 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementEventWatcher" /> 類別來訂閱各種管理事件。

trans-unit.source: The accessible data can be from both managed and unmanaged components in the distributed environment.
trans-unit.target: 可存取的資料都可以來自分散式環境中的 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種元件。
